## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (ESLint passes)
- [ ] No console.log or debug statements left in code
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Code is properly formatted

### Security
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or secrets
- [ ] User input is properly sanitized
- [ ] No XSS vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities (if applicable)

### Accessibility
- [ ] Changes don't break accessibility
- [ ] ARIA labels added where appropriate
- [ ] Keyboard navigation still works
- [ ] Screen reader compatible

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated if needed
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (add entry under "Unreleased")
- [ ] Comments added to explain complex code
- [ ] JSDoc comments added for new functions

### Performance
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders
- [ ] No memory leaks introduced
- [ ] CSS/JS not bloated
- [ ] Changes don't negatively impact performance

### General
- [ ] This PR does one thing (not multiple unrelated changes)
- [ ] Related PRs/issues are linked
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format
- [ ] No merge conflicts
